text: Yasuji Sato (佐藤安治, May 13, 1946; Miyagi Prefecture - March 10, 2021 [age 75]; Fukushima) is a Japanese keyboardist and piano player for The Jaguars. == Career == Sato Participated in The Jaguars reunion event in 1981. (Participation only in the initial stage) Currently, he runs a restaurant in the Fukushima Prefecture. The store is quite large, and he sometimes plays the electone himself, and the customers are enjoying it. On March 20, 2021, Sato died from bronchiectasis at the age of 75. His funeral has held by his fellow Jaguars members and his family in Iizaka, Fukushima. Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese pianists
title: Yasuji Sato
